name: antigravity
description: Antigravity API integration for Claude.ws - authentication, model extraction, environment configuration, and image generation
author: gh/bnopen (AiSon of gh/techcomthanh)

commands.name: antigravity_login
commands.description: Login with Antigravity account and securely store encrypted token

commands.name: antigravity_list_models
commands.description: List all available Claude and image generation models from Antigravity API

commands.name: antigravity_configure
commands.description: Apply extracted Antigravity models to Claude.ws environment with automatic backup

commands.name: antigravity_backup
commands.description: Backup current .env file before making changes

commands.name: antigravity_restore
commands.description: Restore .env file from backup with rollback safety

skills.name: antigravity_generate
skills.description: Generate image using Antigravity image generation models with custom resolution and style options

skills.name: zalo_integration
skills.description: Zalo integration for team notifications, task management, and QR code payments - automatic team additions, task alerts, payment QR generation and delivery
